mapper.sql: USER_ID, USER_NAME, PHONE_NUMBER, UNIT, SEX, JOB, TITLE_GRADE, ACCOUNT, PASSWORD, WECHAT_AUTHORIZATION, RECEIVE_NOTICE_STATUS, ACCOUNT_STATUS, REMARK, CREATED_USER, CREATED_TIME, UPDATED_USER, UPDATED_TIME, DEL
mapper.select:
select a.user_name as createdUser, a.*,b.group_id from user_manage a left join group_user b on a.user_id=b.user_id
left join role_user c on a.user_id=c.user_id left join role_manage d on c.role_id=d.role_id
where 1=1 and a.del=0
and b.group_id =#{userManagePageVO.groupId}
and a.account like "%"#{userManagePageVO.account}"%"
and a.user_name like "%"#{userManagePageVO.userName}"%"
and d.role_name like "%"#{userManagePageVO.roleName}"%"
select DISTINCT a.* from user_manage a LEFT JOIN role_user b on a.USER_ID=b.USER_ID LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu c on b.ROLE_ID=c.role_id where c.menu_id=#{menuId}
select * from user_manage where account=#{account} or PHONE_NUMBER=#{phone}
